title: US racer Lauren Stephens searching for 2024 contract, hopes worlds top-20 will help
content:
The 36-year-old finished 18th in the women's road race in Glasgow, but she doesn't have a ride for next season.

Read the full article at US racer Lauren Stephens searching for 2024 contract, hopes worlds top-20 will help on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
